property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Preference &#40;a Application, Document, XmlStory, Spread, FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting, FindChangeContentTransparencySetting, HtmlItem, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, FormField, Sound, Movie, MediaItem, EPSText, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, SplineItem, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Graphic, Group, TextFrame, PageItem, PageItemDefault, TransparencySetting, StrokeTransparencySetting, FillTransparencySetting, ContentTransparencySetting, FindObjectPreference, ChangeObjectPreference, Story, TextVariable, TextWrapPreference, Page, Book, Link, ObjectStyle, MasterSpread, NamedGrid, TextDefault, ParagraphStyle, InsertionPoint, TextStyleRange, Paragraph, TextColumn, Line, Word, Character, Text, FindTextPreference, ChangeTextPreference, FindGrepPreference, ChangeGrepPreference, FindTransliteratePreference, ChangeTransliteratePreference or DataMerge).

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Preference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
